file.name: railco-employee-openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: RailCoEmployeeAPI
  description: | 
    This is the API definition for the Employee database operations supported by the Micro Integrator backend
  version: 1.0.0
servers:
  - url: http://backend-service:8290/services/EmployeeDataService/
paths:
  /employees:
    get:
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ok
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/EmployeeList'
    post:
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/EmployeeEntry'
        required: true
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ok
  /employees/{id}:
    get:
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          required: true
          style: simple
          explode: false
          schema:
            type: string
            format: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ok
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/EmployeeEntry'
    put:
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          required: true
          style: simple
          explode: false
          schema:
            type: string
            format: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ok
    delete:
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          required: true
          style: simple
          explode: false
          schema:
            type: string
            format: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ok
components:
  schemas:
    EmployeeEntry:
      title: Employee information
      type: object
      properties:
        employee:
          type: object
          properties:
            id:
              type: number
              description: Id of the Employee entry.
            firstname:
              type: string
              description: First name of the employee.
            lastname:
              type: string
              description: Last name of the employee.
            email:
              type: string
              description: Email of the employee.
            title:
              type: string
              description: Title of the employee.
    EmployeeList:
        title: List of employee information 
        type: object
        properties:
          employees:
            type: array
            items:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/EmployeeEntry'
